de.fhb.sailboat.control
Class PlannerImpl.WorkerThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.fhb.sailboat.control.PlannerImpl.WorkerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
PlannerImpl
private class PlannerImpl.WorkerThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Thread for observing the current executed task. Checks repeatedly if the task is finished and starts the next task afterwards. If no task is available for execution, a StopTask is performed.

Author:
hscheel
